text:
Since I installed Apache 2.0, I have had at least 3 hard crashes resulting
in the legendary "Blue Screen of Death". This is purely circumstantial, based
on Apache 2.0 being the only new software.  I'm registering it here as
a nexus to collect other, similar, circumstantial evidence.
creator: ddyer@real-me.net
jwoolley@apache.org
text: Do you have ZoneAlarm Pro or some other firewall software installed perchance?  If so, this is a known problem (in Zone Alarm); see bug 7932.  If not, then you'll need to give us more information -- what exactly does the blue screen message say?  Thanks for using Apache!  PS: Don't forget that it's very important that you upgrade to 2.0.39 for security reasons.

creator: ddyer@real-me.net
text:
I reviewed bug 7932, and everything there seems to be consistant with
my observations.  Pending collection of more BSOD data, I'm willing
to believe these are the same problem.

creator: jwoolley@apache.org
text:
Okay then... I'm going to go ahead and mark this bug report as a duplicate.  If 
you discover new information that makes you think it's a separate issue, feel 
free to reopen this. 
 
Thanks again for your report! 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7932 ***
